  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.kzoo.grid.display.GridDisplay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class MouseMazeGUI
extends edu.kzoo.grid.gui.SteppedGridAppFrame
    Mouse Maze GUI:
    A MouseMazeGUI object represents a window with control buttons and a display for a Mouse-in-a-Maze project. Most of the functionality is provided in the ActiveGridFrame superclass. The GUI is just a prototype at this time.
    Version:
    Feb 25, 2004
    Author:
    Alyce Brady
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
